REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f2303 reute u f BC-EATON-VANCE-<EAVN.O> 10-20 0044

TEXT.TITLE: EATON VANCE <EAVN.O> TO BUY BACK 200,000 SHARES
TEXT.BODY: Eaton Vance Corp said its board authorized the repurchase of up to 200,000 shares of its common stock through privately negotiated or open market transactions. It has 4.3 mln outstanding shares. Reuter
